description: Core business domain models used across multiple features including payments, services, settings, technicians, and time tracking

components.Payment: Payment transaction model with comprehensive payment details including refund support and transaction tracking.

components.PaymentMethod: Payment method enumeration (cash, card, check, gift card, other) with display names and value conversion.

components.PaymentStatus: Payment status enumeration (pending, completed, failed, refunded) for transaction state management.

components.PaymentMethodX: Extension methods for PaymentMethod enum providing display names, string values, and parsing utilities.

rules: Freezed immutable payment model with JSON serialization for transaction data persistence.
Comprehensive payment tracking including amount, tips, card details, and transaction identifiers.
Refund support with refund amount, reason, and timestamp tracking for financial reconciliation.
Payment method enumeration with display name conversion and string parsing for UI integration.
Payment status lifecycle management supporting pending, completed, failed, and refunded states.
Card payment details including card type, last four digits, and transaction authorization codes.
Default values for optional fields ensuring consistent data structure across payment transactions.
Extension methods providing convenient access to formatted display names and value conversion utilities.

components.Service: Core service model with integer category IDs, pricing, duration, and technician assignment support.

rules: Core service model with integer categoryId matching database schema and domain model consistency.
Base price renamed from 'price' for consistency with business domain terminology.
Technician assignment via technicianId instead of technician name for referential integrity.
Comprehensive service metadata including description, active status, and timestamps.
JSON serialization support with null handling for optional fields like updatedAt and technicianId.
Category name resolution through DriftServiceRepository integration for display purposes.
Backward compatibility getters (price, categoryIdString) supporting legacy code integration.
DateTime handling for createdAt and updatedAt fields with ISO8601 string conversion.
Active status flag supporting service lifecycle management and filtering operations.

components.StoreSetting: Application configuration model with typed value support and Drift database integration.

components.StoreHours: Store operating hours configuration with support for different hours per day.

components.DayHours: Individual day operating hours with time conversion utilities and display formatting.

components.SettingCategories: Predefined setting categories (dashboard, store, general, salon) for configuration organization.

components.SettingKeys: Type-safe setting key constants preventing configuration key errors and typos.

rules: Comprehensive application settings management with typed value support and category organization.
Drift database integration with conversion utilities for seamless ORM operations.
Type-safe value conversion supporting boolean, integer, double, and string data types.
Store hours configuration with time-based operations using minutes since midnight format.
Default store hours factory (9 AM - 6 PM, Monday-Saturday, closed Sunday) for initial setup.
Time conversion utilities supporting 12-hour format display and minutes since midnight storage.
Setting update methods preserving data types while updating values and timestamps.
Category-based organization (dashboard, store, general, salon) for settings management UI.
Predefined setting keys as constants ensuring consistency across application configuration.
JSON serialization support for complex settings like store hours with nested day configurations.
System setting flag distinguishing between user-configurable and system-managed settings.
Comprehensive time display formatting with AM/PM format and proper minute padding.

components.Technician: Technician model with status management, turn assignment, specializations, and avatar support.

rules: Technician model supporting turn-based assignment system with availability status tracking.
Status management (available, busy, break, off) with computed properties for workflow logic.
Ticket assignment tracking with current and assigned ticket IDs for workload management.
Capability and specialization tracking for service category expertise and skill management.
Avatar support with color and initial generation for professional UI representation.
Display name formatting showing first name with last name initial (e.g., 'Isabella N.').
Availability computation considering status and off-duty flags for scheduling logic.
JSON serialization with backward compatibility for 'turn' and 'turnNumber' field mapping.
Default avatar generation based on name length for consistent visual representation.
Comprehensive copyWith method supporting partial updates while preserving existing data.

components.TimeEntry: Time clock tracking model with clock in/out, break time, and hours calculation.

components.TimeEntryX: Extension methods for TimeEntry providing calculated hours and formatting utilities.

rules: Freezed immutable time entry model for technician time clock management and payroll tracking.
Clock in/out tracking with optional clock out for active time entries and shift management.
Break time tracking in minutes for accurate hours calculation and labor compliance.
Automatic hours calculation considering break time deduction for payroll accuracy.
Status tracking (active) with computed properties for determining active time entries.
Edit tracking with editedBy and editReason fields for audit trail and time correction management.
Extension methods providing calculated hours, active status, and formatted duration display.
Duration formatting showing hours and minutes (e.g., '8h 30m') for user-friendly display.
JSON serialization support for data persistence and time tracking report generation.
